works.complaint:
The blog indicated above has published my full name,  
employment status and employer's information without my permission or  
authorization. I did not provide this information to them, their internal 

team researched it and posted it. They posted this with the intent to  
slander my personal and professional integrity and potentially harm my  
employment status and relationship with my company. I am currently working
 
with a lawyer to put together a cease and desist, and determine if there
is  
a case for defamation.

The individual behind this post has also harassed me as well as my
employer  
on various other social networks including Twitter and Wordpress with the 

intent to harm my good standing within my company.

More information about defamation can be found here:
